input: The input contains several test cases. Each test consist in just one line, containing two integers S and D, separated by an empty space, representing the desired sum and the number of digits of each term (0 ≤ S ≤ 10.000.000.000 and 1 ≤ D ≤ 10). The end of the input is specified by S = D = −1.
name: Type & Add
